name: nl.cwi.dis.vr2gather
description:
Create networked shared social VR experiences in Unity.
Please check the documentation before installing this package into your project.

samples.description:
A set of assets that are essential when using VR2Gather

When _updating_ the assets from an older version it is best to remember any changes you have made, update the samples, exit Unity, remove the Library cache, start Unity again, apply your changes again.
